#  StatsOP.jl 


`StatsOP.jl` is a Julia package that provides functions to conduct (sequential) tests for time series data, using ordinal patterns. The package builds on the seminal work of @bandt2002. The package is highly optimized and fast. The package is designed to be easy to use and provides a simple interface to compute ordinal patterns from time series data.

## Installation

The package is currently not registered and has to be installed manually from GitHub.
